title: Preferred Location, Stellar Mgmt. Company, Superior Resident Care!
posting_body: We are ready to help you find your new home.
Call now to connect with a Team Member and schedule a tour in-person or virtually!
Make yourself at home at Villas at Germantown where you will find a truly exceptional townhome-style studio, one, two or three-bedroom apartment home.
Our spacious homes feature hardwood-style flooring, bright, open concept floor plans, granite countertops, and in-home washer/dryer.
Your private patio or balcony is the ideal place to sip on your favorite drink and relax.
Enjoy a full amenity suite including a resort-style swimming pool, outdoor grilling, 24-hour state-of-the-art fitness center, on-site pet playground and spa area, car care center, and more.
Attached and detached garage options are available for your convenience as well as online rental payments and maintenance requests.
These beautiful homes are set near parks, streams and lakes, and are accessible to downtown Memphis shopping, dining, arts, entertainment, and recreation.
Villas at Germantown is located at 3750 Moraine St, Memphis, TN 38111.
